name: Salmon
description: As you bite into the salmon, you feel like you're dining in a fancy riverside restaurant.

name: Trout
description: The trout tastes fresh, but you can't shake the feeling it was judging you as you caught it.

name: Bass
description: The bass has a hearty flavor, and you feel a sense of accomplishment for reeling it in.

name: Catfish
description: The catfish tastes earthy, and you wonder if it was plotting revenge from the riverbed.

name: Tuna
description: The tuna is rich and meaty, making you feel like a sushi chef in training.

name: Shark
description: As you bite into the shark, you feel a surge of power, as if you’ve conquered the ocean itself.

name: Goldfish
description: The goldfish tastes like regret and childhood memories of carnival games.

name: Piranha
description: The piranha bites back as you eat it, but its spicy flavor is worth the risk.

name: Swordfish
description: The swordfish tastes sharp and refined, like it was forged in the fires of the sea.

name: Mackerel
description: The mackerel is light and flaky, but you feel like it’s judging your life choices.

name: Eel
description: The eel tastes electric, sending a jolt of energy through your body.

name: Carp
description: The carp tastes plain, but you feel a strange sense of calm as you eat it.

name: Sturgeon
description: The sturgeon tastes luxurious, and you wonder if you should have saved it for caviar.

name: Barracuda
description: The barracuda tastes fierce, and you feel like you’ve unlocked a new level of danger.

name: Marlin
description: The marlin tastes like adventure, and you imagine yourself as a deep-sea explorer.

name: Anchovy
description: The anchovy is salty and bold, perfect for pizza or questionable culinary experiments.

name: Herring
description: The herring tastes smoky, and you feel like you’re at a Nordic feast.

name: Snapper
description: The snapper tastes vibrant, like a tropical vacation in every bite.

name: Grouper
description: The grouper tastes hearty, and you feel like you’ve earned a fisherman’s badge of honor.

name: Halibut
description: The halibut tastes delicate, and you feel like you’re dining in a five-star restaurant.

name: Bluefin Tuna
description: The bluefin tuna tastes exquisite, and you feel like royalty with every bite.

name: Yellowfin Tuna
description: The yellowfin tuna tastes rich and buttery, melting on your tongue like ocean gold.

name: Blue Marlin
description: The blue marlin tastes majestic, and you feel like a champion angler with every bite.

name: Giant Grouper
description: The giant grouper tastes incredibly meaty and satisfying, like a steak from the sea.

name: Mahi-Mahi
description: The mahi-mahi tastes tropical and vibrant, transporting you to warm island waters.

name: King Salmon
description: The king salmon tastes regal and fatty, worthy of its royal name.

name: Albacore Tuna
description: The albacore tuna tastes clean and mild, perfect for a refined palate.

name: Wahoo
description: The wahoo tastes fast and fierce, matching the speed at which it swam.

name: Giant Barracuda
description: The barracuda tastes aggressive and bold, with a bite that matches its personality.

name: Sailfish
description: The sailfish tastes swift and elegant, like it was still racing through the waves.

name: Giant Lobster
description: The giant lobster tastes succulent and buttery, worth every second of the battle.

name: King Crab
description: The king crab tastes royal and sweet, with meat so tender it melts in your mouth.

name: Coconut Crab
description: The coconut crab tastes tropical and mysterious, like a vacation in crustacean form.

name: Spider Crab
description: The spider crab tastes delicate despite its intimidating appearance and long legs.

name: Giant Octopus
description: The giant octopus tastes intelligent and complex, with eight times the flavor.

name: Colossal Squid
description: The colossal squid tastes deep-sea mysterious, from the darkest trenches.

name: Giant Clam
description: The giant clam tastes like the ocean's secret treasure, smooth and briny.

name: Abalone
description: The abalone tastes like pure luxury, prized by chefs worldwide.

name: Mantis Shrimp
description: The mantis shrimp tastes explosive, matching its punch that can break glass.

name: Sea Urchin
description: The sea urchin tastes creamy and oceanic, a delicacy for the brave.

name: Giant Scallop
description: The giant scallop tastes sweet and tender, seared to perfection in your imagination.

name: Geoduck
description: The geoduck tastes strange and wonderful, with a texture that defies explanation.

name: Whale Shark
description: As you bite into the whale shark, you feel a pang of guilt for eating such a gentle giant.

name: Kraken
description: The kraken tastes otherworldly, and you feel like you’ve angered the gods of the sea.

name: Leviathan
description: The leviathan tastes ancient, and you feel like you’ve unlocked a forbidden secret.

name: Sea Serpent
description: The sea serpent tastes fiery, and you feel like you’ve tamed a beast of legend.

name: Phoenix Fish
description: The phoenix fish reignites your spirit with every bite, leaving a warm glow in your chest.

name: Dragonfish
description: The dragonfish tastes smoky and powerful, as if it was cooked by dragon fire.

name: Celestial Koi
description: The celestial koi tastes divine, and you feel like you’ve touched the heavens.

name: Abyssal Angler
description: The abyssal angler tastes dark and mysterious, like a secret from the ocean depths.

name: Loch Ness Monster
description: As you sink your teeth into the Loch Ness Monster, you look up and it says “Could I borrow about tree fitty?”

name: Bravo Case
description: An old barnacle-laden Bravo case.

name: Sunken Treasure Chest
description: A waterlogged treasure chest covered in seaweed. Could be full of gold... or disappointment.

name: Ancient Sword
description: A legendary blade from a forgotten era, still gleaming despite centuries underwater.

name: Pearl Oyster
description: A pristine oyster that might contain a rare black pearl.

name: Message in a Bottle
description: An old bottle with a mysterious message inside. It reads: 'Send nudes.'

name: Golden Compass
description: A magnificent golden compass that always points to... fish?

name: Mermaid's Mirror
description: A shimmering mirror said to have belonged to a mermaid. Your reflection looks surprisingly good.

name: Cursed Pirate Ring
description: A ring bearing a pirate's skull. You feel an urge to say 'Arrr' constantly.

name: Atlantean Coin
description: An ancient coin from the lost city of Atlantis. Worth its weight in water.

name: Kraken's Tooth
description: A massive tooth from the legendary Kraken. Sharp enough to cut through steel.

name: Enchanted Seashell
description: A beautiful shell that whispers secrets of the ocean when you hold it to your ear.
